website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for those looking for a relaxed sculptural style frame or unique gift.
pros: This frame stands out for its uniqueness and casual look
Consumers love that this frame makes it easy to change photos and appreciate its quality
cons: A few felt that the assembled frame was smaller than expected, and a lack of clear instructions tends to an issue for some

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect addition to my wall, and to my home!
customer_reviews.author: jennay413

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Frame!
customer_reviews.text: This frame is awesome! I really like the look of the wood. This frame was easy to put together. I used the nails that came with it, but I noticed the wood leaned in a little so I used some extra scotch wall tape (that came with some wall hooks I bought awhile ago). Adding the tape keeps the wood lined up straight and more secure. All the pictures I hung on this frame are 3.5x5 inches. I was able to hang 27 photos total. I've had my camera in my friends and family faces for a year. I can't wait for them to finally see their pictures when they come over for Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Princess TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews for products but I thought I would for this one! I have been searching for something to display all my photobooth pictures on, because let’s be honest I’d a sucker for a photobooth, and this fit the bill perfectly! I did however purchase some extra photo clips that were a bit smaller because I had so many pictures to hang up and this only Came with 30. Now I have room to add more photos and can’t wait to see what I add in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Love This For Our Family Wall 💗
customer_reviews.text: Great Idea For Pics, It Can Hold Greeting Cards, or Anything of that Sort. I'm not finished yet but it's coming along. Well Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sanspree

customer_reviews.title: Cute for my modern farmhouse theme
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a dirty Santa gift but the box does not show you at all what it is. It comes in a solid black box. So instead of having to explain it I just kept it. It comes in three different pieces on each side that you put together and then hang up. You can tell it is cheaply made but when its hanging up it's really cute. I got complimented on it and plan on adding some lights along the strands. I also like that you can have the strands more dangling or separate the sides more so that they are completely straight.
customer_reviews.author: kbgame

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a few days ago and am so glad I did. I wanted an alternative to using frames and thought this was perfect. It's sturdy and holds so many more photos than I thought. Can't wait to display more in the years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Allisha

customer_reviews.title: Cool hanger
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I hung up with command strips instead of screws in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Belskey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to display lots of pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I hung it up with two sets of large picture command picture hanging strips cut in half. A great way to hang lots of pictures! 6 - 4x4 pictures per row. Before you hang it up it seems like the strings are uneven and they will hang down too low, but just hang it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Beautiful way to display photos. Wish it had more of the clothes pins though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she loves it! Easy to assemble and quick to hang!
customer_reviews.author: efonbuena79

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Well made and just what my teenage son needed to display his photos.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy way to hang a bunch of photos up in my son’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, weird to hang up.
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks, just is weird how it hangs up. Didn’t like the bottom string because it was “saggy” and loose. So I just tucked it behind the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I did have to hot glue gun a couple of the pieces in but overall I am very happy with my purchase. Put up Hawaii pictures and led lights for a frame
customer_reviews.author: Jennalynne

customer_reviews.title: Simple design
customer_reviews.text: Easy and looks great. A little flimsy but wood glue would fix that. It’s a two person, level needed project. Held all my koozies I collect with room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start hanging pictures on my wall in my new house. I have a 5 month old and a ton of 'favorites' when it comes to pictures of him. I don't know that it would fit the full 30 pictures with 4x6 and not look cluttered, so I ordered 30 pictures in 4x4 and it came out really cute. We get a lot of compliments on it when people come over. It's easy to change out pictures and it was easy to hang. Considering a second for another room in the house!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: Got this and hung plenty of pictures ! It was sturdy but I did have some trouble sticking it on to the wall, I used command strips! It is very unique and a great addition to a room
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! U can fit a ton of pictures! I have 4 of them and will probably get more ! In this picture is two together
customer_reviews.author: lisa scivally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is my favorite Amazon purchase. I love that it holds so many pictures and that they are so easily changed out for others. It is a wonderful product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Card Display
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a couple of weeks ago to display Christmas cards. Since I didn't want to hang permanently yet, I found that I was able to use very small command hooks in place of the provided screws. The hooks slid in with little force and so far, has held up the frame. I only have a few cards displayed, so we shall see how it holds up with many. Also, I had this assembled and hung within 5 minutes...so easy! So far, I'm very pleased with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, easy to put up. Looks nice completely assembled. Can only fit 5 4x6 photos on each row, and one must be vertical.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy P.

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a friend. When I opened it the day it arrived, I was amazed by the quality and uniqueness. When she opened it, SHE LOVED IT immediately. I even included a few pictures that I knew she'd love of our time together, that I'd never shared with her before. I'd highly recommend this product for anyone, young or old. It's quality made and simple to enjoy. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: StacyAP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday present. I love it so much. Hardest part is choosing 30 pictures. I need more clothes pins they are so cute
customer_reviews.author: Monica Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Adorable way to hang photos
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together but I’m slightly worried about it’s durability. But for the price i paid it was absolutely worth the purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela123

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Love that I can change photos easily
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to hang. Bought for my kids room and they live it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to put together and stays together well unless you accidentally put the screws in wrong.. then the wood is not great. It’s lower quality, but for the price it’s not a big deal. It just started to break off and the screw wouldn’t hold, but wood glue fixed it. All that said, it looks really good on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: It looks great holding pictures and will be using for Christmas cards mailed to me. A little annoying trying to keep the side panels together during assemble and hanging up but worth it because it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This frame turned out great! It was super easy to put together, although I did use wood glue to glue the frame pieces together, as they come in three parts. Overall great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Badinelli

customer_reviews.title: Got to love this frame!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had old photos laying on his desk and my dresser. I finally got tired of them laying around. I offered to put them in an album and he refused, he wanted them out so he could see them. I got on Amazon to find what they would have for me. It was this wood picture photo frame. Absolutely perfect for what I needed. Plus my husband is happy with it so he can see all of the photos in one place. Great way to display photos and easy to change old for with new.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble! Awesome addition to my living room. And super excited to be able to switch out pictures as often as I want!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Great for pictures or cards
customer_reviews.text: I bought to display 12 month pics at my daughters 1st Birthday and hung up at home to display cards and kids art. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamiefay

customer_reviews.title: Easily My Favorite Decor in My Son's Room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang some cute vintage Dr. Seuss ABC flashcards in my son's nursery and it is easily my favorite decor in there. Such a cute way to hang a large quantity of small pictures - much more eye-catching than a frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to display multiple photos
customer_reviews.text: I love this photo display! I was worried the wood would come out too light and I would have to stain it, but it was a nice rustic wood color and the clothespins matched. It was a perfect size too. Easy to piece together and hang. I like that I am now able to switch out pictures whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Great price, versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up! I’m doing a pink jungle for my babies nursery so I got this to hold her headbands! It’s large, holds a lot! Can be used for many things, and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and was easy to assemble, easy to hang and easy to arrange photos on. Unlike some other wall hanging photo displays, the clips are solidly put together and I’m not worried about them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: caitlinq

customer_reviews.title: Love displaying my photos with this!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this novel photo collage! It was easy to assemble although affixing it to the wall took a little bit of work (tape measure, screw driver & drill). BUT the look of it makes it worth the effort. I plan to buy more of these for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: KoRan

customer_reviews.title: Can easily update pix
customer_reviews.text: It is rustic and matches my decor. Easy to assemble. I glued the sections together. Can change pix so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Thrift shopper 41

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver for displaying photos!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and holds like 40 pictures! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this purchase. My husband bought this for me as a Christmas present after it had been sitting on my wishlist for months. I just opened it to hang on the wall, and it is completely unusable. The pegs in the top left bar do not snugly insert into the bar below it, so when you try to hold it up, it just falls apart. The middle right bar also does this. In addition, the bottom twine is way too long. Even with the bars stretched as far apart as possible, there is still a huge amount of slack on the bottom and it looks ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. The clips that come with it are small but they’re perfect for the design as they don’t block the picture above it from being seen. We fit about five pictures comfortably on each row but pushed it to six and everything is still displayed well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great way to create a picture collage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to display your photos! It was really easy to put together and definitely comes with plenty of clips to hold pictures. I did have a little difficulty hanging it, but only because I did it by myself. It still turned out great, and I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Get the easy sticky picture hangers for it. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had a bunch of extra pictures I found that I didn’t want to put in frames. But I wanted people to see them. This worked perfect! It looks really cute with the Polaroid photos also and goes with the farmhouse look I have going.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ardis

customer_reviews.title: For a friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a buddy for friends, she had it assembled in under 5 minutes, and she loves how easily she can hang up and change photos
customer_reviews.author: eawallace1015

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, cute, good quality, easy to assemble, and it looks so good on my bedroom wall!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fullford

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect way to keep actual print photos without locking them away in a book or splashing the digital image on a screen. I bought one of these and was so impressed. It arrives in a very nice little box and smells like wood when you open it. I love the smell of wood :-) Super easy installation, I handed it to my 16 yo and he had it hung very nicely in minutes. My hubby liked it so much we bought another. It includes matching little clothespins that hold the photos just right. Great price and great quality. Has a nice rustic appearance.
customer_reviews.author: sdtabis5

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great look for all of my photos in my hallway. One of the clips came broken but it still looks great hanging in my hallway. I put it up with some command strips and it’s still going strong for a few months now
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Someone bought me one of these and I just had to go buy another one. I love them! The clips work great and there are plenty of them. It's easy to assemble and hangs well. You can fit a lot of photos on these.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The wood pieces are not equal lengths and the pins are not made very sturdy. We are not using them because the main pieces wouldn't stay together. I was going tok superglue them but then I wouldnt be able to take them apart later. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cristell

customer_reviews.title: Holding my polaroids
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for all the polaroids and photo booth pictures I have and this seemed good. Was really easy to put together and it’s held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bek

customer_reviews.title: No. No. No.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, terrible execution. Was it easy to assemble? yes extremely. But that does not mean you’ll like the finished product. It’s very cheap. The third string was slightly longer causing more slack making it awkward. Honestly. Just plain out BAD. SENT BACK. It didn’t not look good. Also, when pushing the pieces together, you’d have to really jam it and it’s only little wooden spoked. And the wooden frame pieces were warped causing it to curve and then that in combination with the slack string, it looked terrible. Just don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Scott-Budd

customer_reviews.title: Such a Modern thing to have.
customer_reviews.text: Figured this photo frame would be unreliable but I was proved wrong again. I love the fact that I can change all my pictures in just seconds. I don't have to fight and of the frames because the pictures are too hard to take out of a frame. The look also gives a very modern look that kind of intrigues everyone to look at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Zodd

customer_reviews.title: Horrible unless you like sticks an string that fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst product I have ever received on Amazon...I would maybe buy this at a dollar store for a $1. That's how bad it is. It's like sticks and ropes ties to sticks, an it falls apart on the wall as well as while you are trying to salvage your sticks n hang it the wood leaves Mark's all over the wall . Its horrible I cldnt put into words just how horrible it is. I want my money back an shldnt have to return item instead it shld go in the trash where it belongs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Made a quick affirmation and dream board with this. Was easy to put up and cute. May get another!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This product had a very simple assembly, even though ...
customer_reviews.text: This product had a very simple assembly, even though the instructions were kinda confusing. We ended up krazy gluing the pieces together so that they wouldn’t fall apart. It looks so cute and holds a ton of pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Miles Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Adorable rustic looking photo display. Bought for our country cabin and I love that photos can be easily swapped around! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: JennyO

customer_reviews.title: Super cute way to hang photos!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble. Instructions included, however you don't really need them you kinda just put them together. Will male for a great photo display. I am really happy with my purchase and would advise anyone looking for a Christmas gift to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gonyea

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Touch
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a holder for our Koozie collection. We love collecting koozies (or the thing you hold your drink with), but we were running out of drawer space and wanted to be able to display them. This works perfectly as such. However, it lost a star because it's sort of confusing to put together and it doesn't seem that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fun way to display pictures
customer_reviews.text: You would pay way more for a traditional frame that holds this many photos, so if you are looking for bang for your buck and this fits your decor, this is awesome. It comes with 30 clips. I have put up 25 4x6 photos and it's essentially full, so it will be kind of a tight squeeze for all 30, unless they are all portrait. With a mix of portrait/landscape photos, 25 is more realistic. I love the way it looks, and changing out photos could not be easier. I personally love the way it is more casual than traditional frames, almost messy on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I put it together super easy, got it on the wall no problem...but it definitely isnt sturdy and it fell apart the pegs arent big enough to hold the wood together. I have a replacement on the way if that one is better I will update the review otherwise as of right now...not recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $15
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, and made cheap. I had to glue the pieces together to make it stay because it keeps falling off. The "wooden" pieces aren't straight but bendy so it keeps slanting. I should've just made one myself. Not worth the $15 at all, you're better off making it yourself (which I'm going to do).
customer_reviews.author: Erica Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but hard to hang if you’re not handy
customer_reviews.text: Turns out nice when it’s up, and whole assembly is easy it’s hanging it that’s another story. The directions are terrible and if it’s not hung tight the lines will sag a lot and it’ll look dumb. My advice to you is buy it if you like it. It’s a cheap and decorative way to hang multiple photos. But do yourself a solid like I did and super glue the pieces together before hanging (they should’ve made that a step in the directions) and make sure to take EXACT measurements of whee the mounting holes are (I wish theyd give you a template).
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ferrare

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this out for her bedroom and when we received it, the product was just not quite what we expected based on the photos. The side wood pieces are very light/cheap material and comes in multiple pieces that you have to assemble (which detracts from the finished look). The provided screws were too short and didn't work to assemble the wood pieces, so I had to find some longer screws from our own supply at home. Overall, it seems a bit "cheap" but we put it up and it looks okay for a teenager's room. I don't think we would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jinglebells

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in broken. Chipped and falling apart when I put it all together. Very flimsy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiina

customer_reviews.title: cleaver. but not worth the money. could have made this myself via diy project. lol
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to assemble if you follow directions. was kind of hard to place on my wall due to sturdiness but I did it. AND if you don't want huge hoes in your wall because it does require screws in the wall with a power drill ... I used command strips which work awesome bc they hold up to like 20 lbs and this thing is light as a feather. so that worked PERFECT. over all good buy. but not worth 15 bucks you could literally make this yourself ahahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you want “carbonized black”...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to hang multiple pictures. I ordered it in “carbonized black” but when it arrived, it was brown... I was actually pretty upset. However, I decided to keep it and turn it into a small project. So I sanded it all down and stained it black. Also, the screws it came with needed to have bigger heads so I also had to buy new screws. It turned out pretty good after staining it but now I have spent about $15 more on top of spending $20 on this - which is not worth $20. I attached before/after pictures.
customer_reviews.author: kla24

customer_reviews.title: Nice Enough
customer_reviews.text: Everything was included in the box and it assembled and installed easily enough. The side pieces came in three sections each and had to be screwed together. The screw heads are visible. The holes where the twine pieces attach are plugged with some kind of translucent plastic. Basically, I'm saying that it's not fine woodworking, but it's not terrible. It displays a lot of snapshots in a rather attractive way.
customer_reviews.author: Al From Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Should be cheaper for the quality
customer_reviews.text: So it's easy to assemble and will be sturdy enough if you use your own pins and screws. Also the strings are of random lengths so overall the whole thing is just wrong but I made my own changes and altercations to the whole product and it doesnt look that bad now!
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa pazoki

customer_reviews.title: Great for displaying lots of pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of photos I want to display but I don't want to use frames for all of them. I love a photo clothesline and this is a great spin on that. I wanted to use nails to secure it to the wall but the wood bars kept pulling in towards the photos so I also added some 3m velcro strips to hold them to the wall and that worked well. I am only using 4 of the 5 lines because the 5th hangs too low & loose that it looks weird to have things on it. I might get another and have even considered painting the wood white to match my decor! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CALI DECARO

customer_reviews.title: these look really nice, so we bought another
customer_reviews.text: these look really nice, so we bought another, its great to easily update your photos on the go or when you like, and always get attention. Perfect! (note, the second one we ordered didn't look like the first, so they seem to be changing, the first one was better, but they are both still great).
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Came broken. Figured I could attempt to repair and it was so flimsy a piece of the wood side broke. Twine in between wood pieces was so thin and cheap parts of it were so frayed there is no way you could even hang anything on it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend to display his pictures of his grandson. It is a bit awkward to hang up. Its not too sturdy, but once up, it looks very cool with all his pictures clipped on there. I didn't ever get the first one I ordered, so the seller sent me a second free of charge. Because of that great service, I will definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thats Ron to You

customer_reviews.title: Looked good but a bit of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a pinch to use for a display at a fundraiser I was running. I knew I could have built it myself, but time was short and the price made it seem worth a try. But the thing was sooo flimsy—one of the dowels broke while I was putting it together, and I had to reenforce it with a piece of real wood and some glue, so it took a lot of time anyway. BUT, it actually really did look nice and I got a lot of compliments on it, so there’s that. I wouldn’t give it as a gift though because though it looks nice, it feels very cheap when you hold it and assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Saunders

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap, and not durable at all. When I received it it was frayed and one of the strands was ripped out of the wooden "frame". It is cheap plywood and twine. So not worth it. Do not waste your money on this product. I promise you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, my husband glued the pieces together because he was afraid it would fall apart when we hung something on it. Doesn't sit straight on wall...bows in a touch. The equipment it came with to mount was ridiculous, it would have put huge holes in our walls...my husband used something else and then told me I wasted my money he could have built me something much better than it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It was just OK
customer_reviews.text: The wood strips are in 3 pieces on each side and woodglued together, they werent straight. The holes on the back to hang onto screws were too big and they kept falling off so we just turned the whole strip of wood sideways and drilled it right into the wall. It serves its purpose but very cheaply made, probably should have just made our own.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Very cute presentation of photos.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. So handy & makes a great presentation. The wood could match a bit better but every thing else about this item was great. Plenty of tiny wooden clothespins, nice rustic looking strings. Looks terrific on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Cute but could have been better packaged.
customer_reviews.text: In a word: frustrating! Missing one screw for starters (happy to share a picture of the unopened packet). There is no template to help you easily mark the optimal drill points. How much effort would it have been to include this? In my case both left and right sides tilt inwards, so then you’re also left trying to tune the screws to figure out just how deep they should be set. Despite taking careful measurements the thing still does not give me a nice, secure, snug fit against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bigwig

customer_reviews.title: A pain to hang up on the wall
customer_reviews.text: HI! I wanted to love the picture hanger. It was kind of a pain to put together, not super hard, just tedious. Hanging on the wall, was a super pain. Also, the strings are not the same length on mine. I either had to hang it on the wall with not squared proportions or some strings hang. I wanted the two pain parts square on the wall, so, there you go. Also, once you put pictures on the stings, the string dip even lower. Didn't look nearly as nice as the picture. However, it was not super expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Nooooo no no!!! Im so mad i spent this much money on these :((( i could of made these for 5$ myself with stronger wood! This is terrible..
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: The assembly and hanging it up was extremely easy and quick to do
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to be able to hang her own pictures up. The assembly and hanging it up was extremely easy and quick to do. I loved that they included the length of where to put the screws. No need for multiple holes to get it right@
customer_reviews.author: Corlan and Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom for Mother’s Day & she loved it so much! As long as you have a screwdriver it’s super easy to assemble, but I didn’t drill it into the wall, I just used Command strips to stick it to the wall and it works perfectly. Great gift for a birthday, mother’s/father’s day, and looks great in any room/college dorm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Emanuelson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hang pictures up in my room and it looks perfect. I was able to fit 30 normal sized pictures up there and it makes a nice organized-collage-type look. The assembly takes some thought, but I finished it in about 10 minutes with a screw driver and it was kind of fun! It is especially nice for whenever you want to put new pictures up or take some down. I ended up hanging it fairly tight (so the string didn't sag) with 4 sets of velcro-type command strips and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its simple enough and nice looking when mounted. Honestly anyone who had the least bit of skill and two piece of wood a drill and some string could throw something like this together for next to nothing. I'm lazy so I purchased this. It came together and mounted quickly and it looks okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this picture holder!! I can display many pictures without having dozens of frames all over and swap them out when needed. It looks amazing and shipped fast. I put two side by side and love the way it looks. I definitely recommend this frame/holder thing!!
customer_reviews.author: MandyM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap trash no worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap light wood, it's difficult to hang, cheap string. Definately NOT worth the price. As I'm writing this I'm getting more disappointed as I think about it. I have yet to return it, but will be doing so after this review. Better off with doing a dyi project
customer_reviews.author: Robert lydiard

customer_reviews.title: Pieces don’t line up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Finally took it out of the box and put it together. The wooden edges (three pieces each side) “fit” together with pegs. But they don’t really line up to look like one seemless piece. Plus the top section on one bends inward so it just looks cheap. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: pnnylnskywlkr

customer_reviews.title: Assembly takes some time!  Beware!!  Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very cheaply. You have to put it together yourself; and assembly takes a bit of time. It also needs to be hung via screws, etc. I had to use push pins to display this item with old pictures for my daughter's 30th birthday, as we couldn't put nails or screws in the wall at the hall we rented. A bit disappointed at the quality/sturdiness of the picture photo hanging frame.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A

customer_reviews.title: Wood picture photo frame.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for her birthday. I do not know if she will hang it in her office at work or at home. Neither one of us had seen this before I ordered it. I think she will get a lot of compliments when she gets it hung and pictures fastened to it.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine M. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: i love this picture wall hanger you have to be careful though, the little knots that hold the wood together WILL break. i have great taste and style....my bff bought the same thing....did i mention that i have great taste and style....
customer_reviews.author: CHELLEEBEAN  r michelle anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good but be prepared to modify
customer_reviews.text: This turned out looking good because we jerry rigged half of it, but the way they intend to have you hang it up is almost impossible due to how flimsy it is. The wood cracked on one part when I screwed them together and ended up having to wood glue it. It is not something I’d recommend to someone who isn’t handy because you very well may need to adjust a few things to make it look and hang correctly. Considering the price for how many photos it hangs up I’d say it’s not a bad buy but just be prepared to make some modifications.
customer_reviews.author: GQ

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap but looks good enough to hang up. This is perfect if you have standard size polaroids to hang. I have normal photos hanging, it looks ok, but also a bit strange with all of the normal print photos just hanging...
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Fiegleman

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Sturdy, and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I used this during Christmas to display Christmas cards. After Christmas, I kept some cards up and started to display my kiddos artwork and schoolwork. I love it. It was also easy to install and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to hang up all those pictures you get from your friends and family, have all different size pictures hanging on it, my daughter wants one now, will be getting her one as well, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: An ok product for short term use
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cute, but this is a very inexpensive item and very inexpensively made. The two hanging rods do not run parallel because string length at the end is different from string length at the beginning. There is also less hanging space between strings than I expected. However, my 10 year old grandson was very happy with having a place to hang some of his pictures, so that in itself makes it worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect piece
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect, as some strings droop more than others and the pieces of wood don't line up exactly, but I think it adds to the character of the piece and it works perfectly for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and perfect for what I needed. If you’re looking for something easy to hang medium-sized pictures, this is the right photo hanger for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica kerin

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: Love photos and thought this would look so nice. Frame was flimsy so the boards do not sit straight. Mounted on the wall... hard to measure the screws since the frame slides up and down the screw. Looks better in the picture to purchase. I would not buy
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to assemble and keep balanced. It advertised that it would be arriving with adhesive sticks to hang, but didn't. Not worth the money. I now have unnecessary holes in my rental.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Light addition to your wall
customer_reviews.text: Like: -It filled my mission to hold many pictures, compared to even the largest picture frames -Varied uses whether up to down, or side to side in holding and showcasing pictures -Easy set-up Dislike: -A little light/flimsy -Price can be cheaper for the material used (I'd put it down to $10-$12)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It is cheap! It falls apart while trying to hang. Once hung it is not sturdy enough to hold pictures. The holes in back are too big, when hanging it doesn’t stay secure. The twine is longer is some areas. Hate this product! Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Conduff

product_meta.title: Love-KANKEI Wood Picture Photo Frame for Wall Decor 26×29 inch with 30 Clips and Ajustable Twines Collage Artworks Prints Multi Pictures Organizer and Hanging Display Frames Carbonized Black
feature_bullets: 【Multi Photo Display】 - The wood photo frame comes with 30 "clothespins", 6 short wood pieces and 5 twine cords, which satisfies multi pictures display
【Wonderful Decoration 】- Great way to organize and display pictures, casual and neat design; fun and unique way to liven up your home, office or dorm room
【Easy Assembling and Mounting】 - Just connect the woods to be a frame and hang it on the wall; mounting hardwares included; suitable for both horizonal and vertical wall mounting
【Flexible and Versatile】- Change your photos whenever you want, and also suitable for art works or crafts, prints, cards etc. , rope length can be adjusted manually

【100% SATISFACTION SERVICE & Size】- 26 inch of wood length, about 29 inch of rope length, and 6 inch of space between each rope when mounted; 【100% satisfaction service, in case any problem or you are not satisfied, please tell us without hesitation, we will try our best to solve your problem . 】
